indexterm.see: ISO Entity Sets, Added Math Symbols: Negated Relations

refmeta.refentrytitle: Added Math Symbols: Negated Relations Character Entities (%isoamsn;)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Added Math Symbols: Negated Relations Character Entities

refsynopsisdiv.para:
The %isoamsn; parameter entity includes the ISO character entities with the public identifier:
ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Added Math Symbols: Negated Relations//EN
